snippet.title: THE SHORE | Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the Cosmic World of THE SHORE.

THE SHORE is a game that focuses on the mystery of the unknown on a forbidden island with horror elements. The whole story is based on mythology that goes deep through Lovecraft’s creations and beyond. The players will see the story from the eyes of a Father who lost his lovely daughter and will experience the world through immersive atmospheric gameplay while trying to encounter the most nightmarish Lovecraftian entities, survive and solve mind-blowing puzzles all that to save his daughters' life while being haunted; try to survive and uncover the secrets behind the mystery of his own sanity.

Release Date: February 19th.

Find out more about THE SHORE:
🎮 Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1297300/THE_SHORE
🌐 Website: https://www.theshoregame.com
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/theshoregame
🌐 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheShoreGame
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theshoregame
👾 Discord Server: https://discord.gg/gCCWYFWrKx
💼 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-shore-game
🤖 SubReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/theshoregame
📧 Contact: info@theshoregame.com

🎵Soundtrack: Apollon de Moura
#TheShore #TheShoreGame
